name: User login with wrong email or password

steps.name: Checking that input "Email" has a value "user.name@gmail.com"
Checking that input "Password" has a value "  "
Check visible wrong email or password alert
Checking that text "Wrong email or password" is visible
Checking that text "Wrong email or password" has text "Wrong email or password"
